title.rendered: TV3影片登「2018 YouTube Malaysia热门视频」冠军宝座！

content.rendered:
如同往常，随着今年渐渐地进入尾声，现在是时候回顾定义了今年YouTube流行趋势的热门歌曲，爆红视频以及极具创意的创作者了！

以下提及的视频皆已根据大马的总观看时间、分享总数、评论总数、点赞总数和其他标准判定为年度热门视频；他们象征着今年YouTube马来西亚流行趋势的多元性与创新性。


（影片／取自YouTube／TV3MALAYSIA Official，如遭删除请见谅。）

歌手Syamel和Ernie Zakri以其今年2月在TV3音乐颁奖典礼《Anugerah Juara Lagu》上演唱的《Aku Cinta》现场版荣登年度热门视频之首；而紧追其后的则是Astro出品的爆红开斋节广告。

【2018 年度 YouTube Malaysia 热门视频】
1. #AJL32 | Syamel & Ernie Zakri | Aku Cinta
2. Gaya Raya Paling Ori – Filem Pendek Astro Raya 2018
3. Hantu Kak Limah (Tayangan Perdana)[HD] Di Pawagam Mulai 9 Ogos
4. Srikandi Cintaku – Dato’ Awie & Mus May (Ost. Hantu Kak Limah)
5. Dugaan Puasa
6. Kugiran Masdo – Bunga
7. Sedap budak ni nyanyi, berdiri bulu roma kalau dengar
8. Maya Karin muntah darah di set MeleTOP? | Syamsul Yusof & Nasir Bilal Khan
9. Motif Viral: Awek Manja Nak Cendol Pun Tak Tahu Kenapa Dia Viral
10. #AME2018 I Persembahan Ruffedge padu ubat rindu | Bila Rindu, Lemas, Tipah Tertipu, Khayalan

在这些视频当中，有者为优秀的本地音乐作品，让众多听众都听出耳油;有者则为大马人倍感亲切的欢乐趣事集锦，成功戳中了不少观众的笑点。

excerpt.rendered: 如同往常，随着今年渐渐地进入尾声，现在是时候回顾定义了今年YouTube流行趋势的热门歌曲，爆红视频以及极具创意的创作者了！

title.rendered: ARE YOU WATCHING THESE CURRENT TOP 5 HOTTEST SHOWS?

content.rendered:
These days there are so many shows to watch that we don’t even know which one to follow anymore. To make matters worse, TV shows are usually at a fixed timing and if we miss it…well, that’s too bad then.

Thankfully, we’ve got some amazing video streaming services like tonton to help us catch up with all the amazing shows. We get to watch whatever we want, wherever and whenever!

There’s nothing stopping us from actually binge watching all those amazing shows either.

So, have you been catching up with some of the shows that are trending lately?

1. Cross

Source: 텐아시아

Cross is a Korean medical thriller drama which has been taking screens across Asia by storm. The plot includes medical issues, romance, murder and revenge.

This nail-biting TV series stars Go Kyung Pyo, Cho Jae Hyun and Jeon So Min. From the cast alone, you definitely know that the acting is top-notch.

Follow the show on tonton as episodes are released every Monday and Tuesday at 10.30pm, the same time as Korea.

 

2. Doppelganger

Source: Insza

This Singaporean series revolves around the life of a man who constantly runs out of luck no matter what he does. Just as Li Wei thought he was about to have a break in life, something awful happens which turns his life down south again.

Lies are built upon lies to cover up ugly facts but just as those deceit unravel and the truth is revealed, Li Wei finds himself stuck in the toughest dilemma in his life.

Follow as Li Wei weaves through his and others’ lives on tonton every Monday and Friday at 9.30pm.

 

3. Under The Black Moonlight

Source: Viki

This dramatic series which revolves around hidden secrets has captivated audiences from around the world. Nobody could stop watching as long as the show is playing as the mysteries slowly unravel to reveal some of the most shocking incidences.

Love and tragedy just seems to go well hand-in-hand and this show portrays how the worst of the things could go wrong. Follow the show on tonton and don’t be left out of the loop.

 

4. Anugerah Juara Lagu

Persembahan Altimet menerusi lagu Amboi di pentas AJL32

The annual Anugeral Juara Lagu event just happened a while ago and people have been replaying the event from tonton non-stop.

The event sold out within hours of the launch of the tickets at the Axiata Stadium so for those left at home watched it through tonton which live-streamed the whole event, including all of the performances and special backstage interviews!

If you haven’t watch all those epic acts yet, fret not as you can still catch-up through tonton.

 

5. Singing In The Spring: The Movie

This tonton original movie is the perfect Chinese New Year film to watch with the family this year. The TV series itself has been hilariously enjoyable to watch.

The singing competition has ended and so has the rivalry. Though the competitors have been going at each other while baring their teeth and fangs, they suddenly became a united community after the competition finished.

However, a newcomer to the neighbourhood is a wolf in sheep’s clothing as he has a motive for joining those people. What trouble could possibly come next?

 

Indeed, these programs are deemed the current hottest shows for a reason; they are just so entertaining to watch!

If you haven’t kept up with these shows, then it’s time to do so now through tonton.

excerpt.rendered: There are many shows trending currently but are you keeping up with these current top 5 shows?

title.rendered: HERE’S A LIST OF THE AJL32 WINNERS!

content.rendered:
The highly anticipated award show was held at Axiata Arena, Bukit Jalil on Sunday, 11th of February with an amazing turn out.

It was a star-studded event as many top celebrities like Hael Husaini, Azmi Caliph Buskers, Haqiem Rusli, Syamel, Erni Zakri, Altimet, Khai Bahar, Stacy, and many more attended the award show! 

Below is the list of winners for Anugerah Juara Lagu 32.

1. Anugerah Juara Lagu – Hael Husaini

Image via mynewshub

Hael was awarded Anugerah Juara Lagu 32 as he is the winner of the award show. He won with his song, ‘Jampi’, which was highly anticipated by fans and his fanbase is massive!

Hael performed with a whole new arrangement of his song accompanied with extraordinary LED lights. This definitely brought a surprise to his fans.

Besides, he won himself a total of RM50,000, CJ Wow Shop vouchers worth RM10,000 and also a gorgeous trophy.

 

2. Runner Up of AJL – Azmi Caliph Buskers

The runner up of the night went to Azmi Caliph Buskers who sang ‘Sejati’ which was written by Faizal Tahir and Mike Chan. He won RM35,000 and a gorgeous trophy too.

 

3. Second Runner Up of AJL – Haqiem Rusli

Image via melvister.com

Haqiem Rusli brought home the title of second runner up of AJL with his song ‘Tergantung Sepi’ written by Gouffran and Ibnu.

He won himself RM20,000 and the beautiful AJL trophy.

 

4. Best Vocal Performance – Syamel and Erni Zakri

The best vocal performance went to Syamel and Erni Zakri who showcased their great synchronising abilities through their song ‘Aku Cinta’.

They also wowed the fans by showing off their powerful vocals throughout the night.

With that strong performance and steady vocals, they won themselves a total of RM12,000, and CJ Wow Shop vouchers worth RM2,000. 

 

5. Best Performance – Altimet 

Just as expected from the response of the crowd, Altimet took home the title of ‘Best Performance’ with his song ‘Amboi’.

The song is so addicting and fun that the whole crowd sang along with him, hence he had won RM12,000 cash, a brand new Samsung Galaxy A8 and also a trophy.

 

6. Samsung Singer of the Year – Khai Bahar 

The singer of ‘Bayang’ was chosen as Samsung’s Singer of the Year and he was awarded with a brand new Samsung A8+ and a trophy too.

 

The most mesmerizing part of Anugerah Juara Lagu 32 was the colourful closing performance ‘Pop Yeh Yeh’ that combined all of the classic songs ‘Tak Mengapa’, ‘Suzana’, ‘Hidup Bersama’, ‘Syurga Idaman’, ‘Siapa Gerangan’ and ‘Kenanganku’.

All these songs were sang by Malaysia’s top singers such as Datuk A.Rahman Hassan, Datuk Jeffrydin, Datuk Awie, and Siti Sarah! 

A huge congratulations to all winners of Anugerah Juara Lagu 32! 

Written by: Chan Suet Yee

excerpt.rendered: The 32nd Anugerah Juara Lagu ended with an overwhelming response from fans and viewers. Did you catch who the winners are? Here’s a list of all of them.

title.rendered: AJL32 : SYAMEL ‘NERVOUS’ LIHAT PERSEMBAHAN FINALIS LAIN

content.rendered:
Gandingan Syamel dan Ernie Zakri menerusi lagu Aku Cinta ternyata memberi tuah kepada pasangan ini apabila tampil sebagai pemenang Vokal Terbaik di malam kemuncak Anugerah Juara Lagu uke 32, malam tadi.

Syameel Aqmal Mohd Fodzly atau lebih dikenali sebagai Syamel menyifatkan kemenangan bersama Ernie sebagai ‘ganjaran’ selepas keduanya telah melakukan yang terbaik! Tak sia-sia kan lepas dah berhempas-pulas dengan latihan, akhirnya…

“Macam tak percaya sebab kalau diikutkan vokal Kak Salma antara yang paling menyerlah. Alhamdulillah, ini dinamakan rezeki,” komennya.

Penyanyi berusia 25 tahun ini turut berkongsi keadaannya sebelum malam kemuncak AJL berlangsung!

“ Kalau nak tahu, saya jarang menyaksikan persembahan penyanyi lain ketika sesi rehearsal. Perasaan cuwak itu akan datang tiba-tiba.

“ Mulalah saya gelabah apabila persembahan tidak ‘mencapai piawaian’ seperti artis lain. Jalan selamat, saya jarang tengok persembahan penyanyi lain ketika sesi latihan,” katanya dalam nada berjenaka.

Ketika ditanya sama ada Syamel akan meneruskan projek duet bersama Ernie lagi selepas ini, Syamel menyatakan kesudiannya jika diizinkan- Nya.

“ Kalau kena dengan waktu sesuai, lagu dan lirik yang bagus, saya dengan tangan terbuka sudi untuk menjadi teman duet Ernie dalam projek akan datang,” akhirinya yang tersipu malu apabila diusik dengan soalan ‘nakal’ media.

Kami di Xtra.com.my mengucapkan Tahniah Syamel & Ernie, you guys did very well, bravo!

excerpt.rendered: Ketika ditanya sama ada Syamel akan meneruskan projek duet bersama Ernie lagi selepas ini, Syamel menyatakan kesudiannya jika diizinkan- Nya…

title.rendered: HAEL TAK BOLEH BAYANG HIDUP TANPA HELENA

content.rendered:
Pemenang trofi Juara Lagu di Anugerah Juara Lagu (AJL)  Hael Husaini sama sekali tidak menyangka kemenangan besar berpihak kepadanya.

Apa tidaknya, melihat kepada persaingan sengit terutama persembahan ‘otai’ seperti Dayang Nurfaizah, terkejut Hael dibuatnya!

” Saya tak pernah bayangkan mendapat tempat sebegini di dalam industri seni suara. Kejayaan ini mungkin pengenalan bagi karier saya. Sungguh saya tak ramal boleh menang pada malam ini, Syukur!,” katanya yang kagum dengan vokal mantap Ernie Zakrie menerusi persembahan ‘Aku Cinta’.  

Inilah rezeki namanya…Akui Hael lagi, kemenangannya turut berkait rapat dengan kehadiran Helena dalam hidupnya.

“ Saya menumpang rezeki Helena. Sejak kehadiran bayi perempuan comel ini, saya akui rezeki dalam bidang seni semakin mencurah-curah,” katanya yang ditemui pada majlis sidang media, semalam.

Kata jejaka berusia 29 tahun ini lagi, Helena merupakan anugerah terindah dalam hidupnya dan kemenangan ini ditujukan khusus untuk bayi comel itu…Alahai, sweet la daddy Hael ni.

“ Saya tidak boleh bayangkan hidup tanpa Helena,” ujarnya ringkas.

Malam kemuncak AJL32 menyaksikan lagu Jampi ciptaan Hael dan Ezra Kong, menewaskan 11 lagu lain.

Mereka membawa pulang hadiah wang tunai berjumlah RM50,000, sebuah trofi dan baucar CJ Wow Shop bernilai RM10,000. Tahniah Hael dan Ezra!

Dalam masa sama, Hael yang bergiat aktif dalam mencipta lagu turut memberitahu dia bakal menerbitkan lagu untuk penyanyi nombor satu negara, Datuk Seri Siti Nurhaliza.

“Insya-Allah, akan ada satu projek khas. Perancangannya dalam tahun ini juga cuma saya tak boleh nak cerita dengan lebih lanjut. Tunggu okay,” katanya.

excerpt.rendered: Helena merupakan anugerah terindah dalam hidupnya dan kemenangan ini ditujukan khusus untuk bayi comel itu…Alahai, sweet la daddy Hael ni…

content.rendered:
The 32nd Anugerah Juara Lagu is happening right now at Axiata Stadium Bukit Jalil!

Many amazing local celebrities graced the event and they definitely put on some amazing outfits too. From beautiful princess-like dresses to modern hipster clothes, this star-studded event is truly lit.

Check out some of the best dressed celebrities tonight:

1. Elizabeth Tan

Elizabeth Tan isn’t a model for nothing. She put on a glamourous red dress with lace on the upper body part which portrayed a graceful demeanor.

Elizabeth is also obviously a risk-taker and a rebel as she broke the no.1 red carpet rule; do not wear red when walking down the red carpet.

Regardless, she absolutely nailed it with this red dress tonight.

 

2 & 3. Jazel Lim & Dennis Yin

Jazel and Dennis are one of Malaysia’s many power couples. The pair just looks so stunning tonight.

Jazel is wearing an popping red dress which is a tad bit revealing but somehow makes it look all the more elegant. Dennis on the other hand could not look any dapper in his suit and red shirt.

They too, like Elizabeth, broke the golden rule of the red carpet. But they definitely look outstanding tonight.

 

4. Ifa Raziah

Ifa is a singer, actress, comedian, entertainer, critic, ambassador, entrepreneur as well as a TV host who is famous in Malaysia, Indonesia and Singapore.

She truly is a multi-talented gem!

On top of all that, she looks royally stunning tonight with her queen-like dress. Who could ever beat a woman like her anyways?

 

5. Nur Sajat

Nur Sajat absolutely slayed the red carpet with a colourful retro dress. Some may say that the 80’s are calling back for that outfit but we say it is absolutely jiving.

With one side of her dress being sleeveless and the other in a long sleeve, she’s got a symmetric edge too her shiny clothes too.

 

Who do you think wore their outfits best?

P.S, catch AJL32 live right now on tonton.com.my or xtra.com.my so that you’re not missing out.

excerpt.rendered: The Anugerah Juara Lagu 32 is filled with many top celebrities. Check out who donned the best outfits tonight.

title.rendered: DUET DENGAN WANITA LAIN? TAJUL PERLU MASA ‘EXTRA’

content.rendered:
Bakal tampil dengan single terbaru bersama Wany Hasrita, penyanyi Tajul akui dirinya lebih selesa berduet dengan wanita itu berbanding penyanyi wanita lain.

Katanya, keserasian wujud tanpa mengambil masa yang lama jika duet bersama Wany Hasrita. Wah dik, lain macam bunyi ni…

 “ Sedikit masa diperlukan untuk membina perasaan tersebut dengan penyanyi lain,” katanya ringkas.

Keserasian bermula selepas penghasilan duet mereka bertajuk Disana Cinta Disini Rindu, tahun lalu.

Akui Tajul lagi, chemistry tercipta mungkin disebabkan keduanya sudah biasa dan memahami antara satu sama lain.

” Kalau berduet dengan penyanyi wanita lain memerlukan sedikit masa untuk cipta keserasian itu. Cumanya, jika diberi peluang tak salah untuk saya mencuba,” beritahu Tajul kepada mStar Online.

Lagu Disana Cinta Disini Rindu ciptaan komposer Patrick Kamis ternyata menerima sambutan baik pendengar. Buktinya, lagu itu mendapat lebih 11 juta tontonan di laman YouTube sejak dimuat naik sejak Jun 2017. 

Namun berlainan bagi Wany pula. Wanita cantik manis ini memberitahu dia tiada masalah jika berduet dengan mana-mana penyanyi lelaki lain.

“ Saya bersikap profesional dan menjadikan gandingan tersebut diterima ramai sama seperti lagu terdahulu.

“Saya tak kisah jika perlu berduet dengan penyanyi lain. Soal kerja saya kena profesional dan melakukan sebaik mungkin. Saya percaya kalau kita buat sesuatu dengan ikhlas, Insya-Allah peminat akan terima dan tak salah kita cuba sesuatu yang baru.

“Lagipun sekarang ni saya banyak terima tawaran persembahan dengan penyanyi-penyanyi lelaki lain seperti Khai Bahar dan ramai lagi, jadi tak ada masalah tentang hal ini,” katanya.

excerpt.rendered: Bakal tampil dengan single terbaru bersama Wany Hasrita, penyanyi Tajul akui dirinya lebih selesa berduet dengan wanita itu berbanding penyanyi wanita lain. Katanya, keserasian wujud tanpa mengambil masa yang lama jika duet bersama Wany Hasrita. Wah dik, lain macam bunyi ni…  “ Sedikit masa diperlukan untuk membina perasaan tersebut dengan penyanyi lain,” katanya ringkas. […]

content.rendered:
Tak habis-habis lagi dengan cerita finalis AJL32? Kalau sebelum ini Altimet dengan lagu amboi nya selamba dikritik di laman twitter sehinggakan Altimet sendiri meminta kepada para keyboard warrior agar menggunakan #TakNakAmboi sebagai tanda protes lagu itu tidak sesuai disenaraikan di Pentas AJL32, kali ini giliran Ayda Jebat pula dikecam netizen dan dilabel sebagai tidak bersyukur atas keputusan juri.

Bagi Netizen, Ayda seharusnya bersyukur dan menerima keputusan dengan hati yang terbuka memandangkan Ayda antara finalis yang layak berentap di SFMM32.

Pihak Pengurusan Ayda Jebat turut  memberitahu,  mungkin sebelum ini ada cakap-cakap ataupun status yang dimuat naik berbaur sindiran daripada Ayda Jebat yang boleh menyebabkan ramai pihak terasa hati dengan tindakannya itu. Namun, mungkin itu adalah cara beliau menunjukkan rasa kecewa terhadap  pemilihan  finalis yang akan beraksi di pentas AJL32 nanti.

 

 

antara status yang telah dimuat naik oleh Ayda

Kalau melihat kepada persembahan Ayda pada malam itu, memang tidak dinafikan banyak perubahan baik dapat dilihat. Terutamanya, dari aspek vokal dan persembahan. Tetapi, bagai sudah tertulis, bukan rezeki Ayda Jebat untuk mempertaruhkan lagu Mata ciptaan Audi Mok dan dirinya sendiri untuk disenaraikan sebagai antara Finalis yang berentap nanti.

Persembahan bertenaga Ayda Jebat semasa SFMM32 minggu pertama

Kalau dilihat, setiap kali Ayda memuat naik status di instagramnya itu, netizen juga tidak putus-putus mengambil peluang  memberi serangan balas diruangan komen Ayda.

antara kecaman netizen terhadap Ayda

Kepada Ayda Jebat, mungkin Ayda boleh belajar untuk menerima keputusan secara positif dan bertindak secara profesional kerana setiap lagu telahpun dipilih oleh barisan Juri yang bukan calang-calang orangnya.

Semoga terus sukses ya Ayda!

excerpt.rendered: Sebagai tanda protes lagu itu tidak sesuai disenaraikan di Pentas AJL32, kali ini giliran Ayda Jebat pula dikecam netizen dan dilabel sebagai tidak bersyukur atas keputusan juri.
